title: problem
body: plz it keeps on saying error visit dis site overtime its been going on for a day now and i can't do masteries i need to get azir masteries but it says error i cant do masteries please fix this problem

replies.body:
Ayo Mikachu2,

Can you try repairing your client? If you're unsure how to do so, check out this guide:

http://kb.leaguevolunteers.com/tech:repairing_client

Keep me updated!
